The earnest breathings of forreign Protestants, divines & others, to the ministers and other able Christians of these three nations for a compleat body of practicall divinity ... and an essay of a modell of the said body of divinity / by J.D. ... ; together with an expedient tendered for the entertainment of strangers who are Protestants, and by their means to advance the Gospel unto their several nations and quarters ... Dury, John, 1596-1680.
[9], 57 p.
Printed for T. Underhill ..., London : 1658.
Preface signed: John Dury. Errata on p. 57. Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York. Marginal notes.
=======

Dury, John, 1596-1680.
[9], 57 p.
Printed for T. Underhill ..., London : 1658.
Preface signed: John Dury. Errata on p. 57. Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York. Marginal notes.
